short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension features a sleek and dynamic design, showcasing stunning supercar imagery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring breathtaking supercar visuals, this extension brings the thrill of the race track to your new tab page. Enjoy a minimalistic search bar, personalized shortcuts, and up-to-the-minute weather updates, all seamlessly integrated with the stunning background. Perfect for those who live life in the fast lane and want their browser to reflect their love for supercars.
